about_the_game:
"Love Pork Knuckle Rice" - A romantic encounter between construction sites and pork knuckle rice!

"When you think your life has ended, the concrete mixer of fate is running secretly!"

The bankrupt Huang Xia took the last rent money and fled to the handshake building in Huadu Village. He wanted to eat pork knuckle rice with Xiaomao and other old men, but he unexpectedly met the goddess of the construction site "Chen Jiayi", thus starting a new civil engineering counterattack life.

It's great, civil engineering is great again! Even if we are completely at the bottom, we can have a better tomorrow through struggle!

Game Features

Adapted from a true story: On-site interviews with B Station's "Huang Xia Wandering Around the World" and "Little Hat's Journey", and other people, the real story of hanging on the wall is staged in front of you

Real-life shooting of urban village scenes: Real-life shooting of urban villages in Guangdong and Henan, striving to restore the most realistic lying experience

Inspirational counterattack of civil engineering: Three generals and five items are not a dream, who says there is no tomorrow in civil engineering?

Multiple endings: Internet cafe god/Island Boom/Park Storm... Of course, you may also be forced to the rooftop by the debt collector

"In this magical urban village where the handshake building is closer than the heart, you will witness: the golden foot story of the project manager and the supervisor, the civil goddess who loves to eat pig's feet rice, and - the future of civil engineering! "

Character introduction

Chen Jiawen

The daughter of the boss of Huazhu Construction, a student majoring in intelligent construction at Huadu University, dreams of becoming a civil engineer as handsome as her cousin Chen Jiayi. But because her cousin was also at the construction site and did not go home during the Chinese New Year, she was troubled and asked the male protagonist Huang Xia for help.

Chen Jiayi

The eldest princess of Huazhu Group, she has a bad relationship with her family because she loves to work at the construction site and is unwilling to go back to inherit the family business. She likes to eat pork trotter rice and works alone as a construction worker at the construction site.
